item.title: EngineGL
item.description: This is a work in progress toy renderer written in C++ and OpenGL to learn new graphics techniques and C++. The renderer features at the moment: Forward rendering Spot and directional lights support Shadowmapping Soft edge shadows Shadow support for multiple lights Environment mapping + simple environment reflections. Soft shadows To add soft shadows I implemented the technique described in GPU Gems 2 ch. 17. Basically it adds some noise to offset the sample points for the PCF technique.
